ygData.subject: Dwarven Plate Armor of Brell Serilis Bugged?
ygData.msgSnippet: This morning, I decided to bite the bullet and try making some of the Dwarven Plate Armor of Brell Serilis (skill 178). Much to my surprise, all of the recipes
ygData.messageBody:
This morning, I decided to bite the bullet and try making some of the
Dwarven Plate Armor of Brell Serilis (skill 178). Much to my
surprise, all of the recipes on reputable sites (EQ Casters,
AllaKhazam's Magical Realm, etc.) were the same, but none of them
worked!

The Dwarven Plate Armor recipes worked, yet most of the sites just
added an Imbued Ruby to the list to upgrade Dwarven Plate to Dwarven
Plate Armor of Brell Serilis. When I made my attempt, the Stormguard
Forge just spit the components back at me saying that they would not
combine in those quantities. Fortunately, none of the VERY expensive
components were lost in the failure (I just closed and reopened the
forge to find my items waiting for me).

Is the most advanced racial/diety armor bugged, or do we just not
know what the correct recipe is yet?


Thanks for the help.

- Khazade
Paladin of the Duke of Below
GM, The Peacekeepers of Norrath
Tallon Zek
khazade@...
http://www.cheatsearch.com/eq
